verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
No more crying there
We are going to see the King
Alleluia, alleluia,
We're going to see the King!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
No more dying there
We are going to see the King
Alleluia, alleluia,
We're going to see the King!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Alleluia, alleluia,
Alleluia, alleluia,
Soon, and very soon,
We are going to see the King;
Alleluia, alleluia,
